content: it may led to the myth saying seven lords has create the machine that can produce a magical music which helped rebuilding the society, but then they turned on each other (or there were an external factor comes into play) and the war happens. some legend may have refer to the protagonist as an evil witch who deliver the secret of magic to seven lords. the problem is for this myth to form it'll take too long and it won't be realistic to have the protagonist living and traveling as a music box maker in her adulthood. how fast for such a myth to integrate in people beliefs?
